content: get ready for halloween with this spooky but super cute black cat garland this pattern is quick and easy and you can make as many motifs as you need to make a longer garland if you don t want to make a garland these cats can easily be used as hanging decorations gift toppers or even coffee table coasters be sure to share your black cat creations with us on instagram #loveandstitchco or @loveandstitchco
